com.nutiteq.geometry
Class VectorElement

java.lang.Object
  com.nutiteq.geometry.VectorElement
Direct Known Subclasses:
BillBoard, Geometry, NMLModel, NMLModel.Proxy, Polygon3D
public abstract class VectorElement
extends java.lang.Object

Abstract base class for all vector elements (points, lines, texts, models, etc).

Field Summary
 java.lang.Object userData
          User-defined custom data associated with the element.
 
Constructor Summary
VectorElement(Label label, StyleSet<?> styles, java.lang.Object userData)
          Default constructor.
 
Method Summary
 void attachToDataSource(VectorDataSource<?> dataSource)
          This method is intended for data sources - when element is added to the data source, it has to be attached to form bidirectional link between data sources and elements.

          This method is intended for vector layers - when element is added to the layer, it has to be attached to form bidirectional link between layers and elements.

          This method is intended for data sources.

Field Detail

userData

public java.lang.Object userData
User-defined custom data associated with the element.

Constructor Detail

VectorElement

public VectorElement(Label label,
                     StyleSet<?> styles,
                     java.lang.Object userData)
Default constructor.

Parameters:
label - label associated with this element. Can be null.
styles - style set for this element. Actual style is selected by zoom level of the layer this element is attached to.
userData - custom user data associated with this element.
Method Detail

getId

public long getId()
Get element id.

Returns:
element id. If no id is previously defined, returns -1.

setId

public void setId(long id)
Set element id.

Parameters:
id - new element id

getLayer

public VectorLayer<?> getLayer()
Get the layer this element is attached to.

Returns:
the layer this element is attached to. Can be null.

getDataSource

public VectorDataSource<?> getDataSource()
Get the data source this element is attached to.

Returns:
the data source this element is attached to. Can be null.

getLabel

public Label getLabel()
Get the label of this element.

Returns:
the label associated with this element.

setLabel

public void setLabel(Label label)
Set the label of this element.

Parameters:
label - the new label for the element.

getStyleSet

public StyleSet<?> getStyleSet()
Get the style set of this element.

Returns:
the style set of the element.

isVisible

public boolean isVisible()
Get the visibility flag of this element.

Returns:
true if element is visible, false if invisible.

setVisible

public void setVisible(boolean visible)
Set the visibility flag of this element.

Parameters:
visible - new visibility value for the element.

attachToLayer

public void attachToLayer(VectorLayer<?> layer)
This method is intended for vector layers - when element is added to the layer, it has to be attached to form bidirectional link between layers and elements.

Parameters:
layer - the layer to attach this element to.

detachFromLayer

public void detachFromLayer()
This method is intended for vector layers. When element is removed from layer, it must be detached to drop the element-layer link.

attachToDataSource

public void attachToDataSource(VectorDataSource<?> dataSource)
This method is intended for data sources - when element is added to the data source, it has to be attached to form bidirectional link between data sources and elements.

Parameters:
dataSource - the data source to attach this element to.

detachFromDataSource

public void detachFromDataSource()
This method is intended for data sources. When element is removed from data source, it must be detached to drop the element-data source link.

setActiveStyle

public void setActiveStyle(int zoom)
This method is intended for vector layers - it will update element internal state based on zoom level.

Parameters:
zoom - active zoom level.
